dcterms:description: The HAR dataset records the daily activities of 30 participants and generates six different labels for these activities.
dcterms:title: HAR (Human Activity Recognition)

dcterms:creator: A. Reiss
D. Stricker
dcterms:description: The PAM dataset recorded 18 different daily activities with 17 sensors, but only 8 activities with more than 500 samples were used in this study.
dcterms:title: PAM (Physical Activity Monitoring)

dcterms:description: The UCR time series archive is a well-known benchmark that contains both univariate and multivariate time series classification datasets.
dcterms:title: UCR/UEA Archive
